name: CLGeocoder
desc: An interface for converting between geographic coordinates and place names.

items.name: func reverseGeocodeLocation(CLLocation, preferredLocale: Locale?, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a reverse-geocoding request for the specified location and locale.

items.name: func reverseGeocodeLocation(CLLocation, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a reverse-geocoding request for the specified location.

items.name: func geocodeAddressString(String, in: CLRegion?, preferredLocale: Locale?, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified address string and locale information.

items.name: func geocodeAddressString(String, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified string.

items.name: func geocodeAddressString(String, in: CLRegion?, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding request using the specified string and region information.

items.name: func geocodePostalAddress(CNPostalAddress, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified Contacts framework information.

items.name: func geocodePostalAddress(CNPostalAddress, preferredLocale: Locale?, completionHandler: CLGeocodeCompletionHandler)
items.desc: Submits a forward-geocoding requesting using the specified locale and Contacts framework information.

items.name: var isGeocoding: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver is in the middle of geocoding its value.

items.name: typealias CLGeocodeCompletionHandler
items.desc: A block to be called when a geocoding request is complete.
